plot: Melinda meets a troublesome teenage ghost with a grudge, and learns about the inventive, toxic uses high-school students have found for the internet.

Thomas - the brother of a young woman named Lucy - dies and everyone blames her for his death. Ned asks Melinda for help when he believes something ghostly is going on with the girl. Melinda sees the ghost of Thomas and realizes he is haunting 2 other kids in his class, and that his sister is being blamed.—Spoilerfix
